title: ipyvue-flatsurf
description:
This project provides Jupyter Widgets for the flatsurf suite. In particular it provides interactive widgets for translation surfaces from sage-flatsurf and their quotiens and flow decompositions. Behind the scenes, this project provides the glue between the mathematical objects of sage-flatsurf and flatsurf and actual visualization in the browser which is implemented in vue-flatsurf.

Please visit our home page for more infermation.
